comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Walter Chambers was on the Executive Committee of the National Birth Control League in 1918.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Suffragette gathering in NYC in January, 1914, to publicize the upcoming Suffragette Ball and Dance Exhibition, to be held at the 71st Street Armory, on January 31, 1914. 

Other Bain/LOC photos of this event:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4798747595/in/photostream/]
